name: Firecracker
skill: Deals 1095/1395 DMG to a wide area of enemies.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a firecracker that makes lots and lots of loud noises. Dedicated to making as much noise as possible with firecrackers, she appears out of nowhere to cause a commotion around Lunar New Year. She carries various firecrackers, ranging in size from very large to very small. She says, with the regulations getting stricter, she needs different firecrackers for different situations. She sure loves to explode them, but she's unexpectedly considerate when it comes to cleaning up after herself or being careful of reverberations.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Defeat LVL 10, 20, 30 Belphegor.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Event: Random drops after LVL 10.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Get a First and Second Half Ranking of 6001~10000.
◦ "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" Get a Total Ranking of 7501~10000.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: Slightly increases total Event Points gained during the "A New Year's Tale of Laziness" event.
